item.title: 'Super Smash Bros. Ultimate' DLC: 'Persona 5' Character Coming In First Challenge Pack - Forbes
item.description:
'Super Smash Bros. Ultimate' DLC: 'Persona 5' Character Coming In First Challenge Pack  Forbes

Super Smash Bros. Ultimate just released on December 7 for the Nintendo Switch, but we’ve already learned about the first piece of DLC. As a part of the Challenger 1 Pack, Joker from the Persona 5 franchise will be added to the game. Joker in SSBU This announcement was made and revealed at the 2018 Video Game Awards in Los Angeles on Thursday night. Here is a look at the trailer: clearly, we wish there was a snippet of gameplay with Joker and/or on his stage, but based on the early reviews of SSBU, we’d be inclined to expect a solid and imaginative rendering. This is a significant add for S...

item.title: The Game Awards 2018 announcements: Dragon Age 4 and Far Cry: New Dawn headline new game reveals - The Telegraph
item.description:
The Game Awards 2018 announcements: Dragon Age 4 and Far Cry: New Dawn headline new game reveals  The Telegraph

BioWare has announced that RPG Dragon Age 4 is coming at The Game Awards ceremony. The long-awaited fantasy RPG is reportedly still early in development, but BioWare has teased its fans with a short video and the phrase The Dread Wolf Rises; a reference to elven apostate Solas. Far Cry: New Dawn, a direct post-apocalyptic sequel to Ubisoft's open-world shooter Far Cry 5, was unveiled for 15 February 2019. The game is set 17 years after Far Cry 5, with a 'super-bloom' transforming the setting of Hope County into a vivid, colourful post-nuclear land. And staying with pink post-apocalyptia, Ra...

item.title: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate review | A riotous fighter and gloriously bonkers video game celebration - The Telegraph
item.description:
Super Smash Bros. Ultimate review | A riotous fighter and gloriously bonkers video game celebration  The Telegraph

Nearly twenty years after the first Super Smash Bros, the core appeal of Nintendo’s raucous fighter remains the same: being able to give Pikachu a good shoeing. Or using Donkey Kong to ground Fox McCloud by headbutting him into the dirt. Or allowing Princess Peach her ultimate revenge, belting Bowser into the stratosphere using a baseball bat. But in contrast to the ability for Nintendo characters to impart cartoonish violence on one another, Super Smash Bros. is also a celebration. A party to which anyone or anything that has graced a Nintendo console is invited, and the entertainment is a...

item.title: 'Super Smash Bros. Ultimate' Release Date And 10 Things You Should Know Before You Buy The Game - Forbes
item.description:
'Super Smash Bros. Ultimate' Release Date And 10 Things You Should Know Before You Buy The Game  Forbes

As Nintendo Switch exclusives go, there aren’t many that are more valuable than the upcoming Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. SSBU for Nintendo Switch This iconic series has rarely produced a dud and with more characters than ever, expectations are high for yet another noteworthy achievement. SSBU releases on December 7 and here are the 10 things you should know about the final major video game release of 2018. Special Edition Info The Standard Edition will cost $59.99 and just comes with the game. MyBestBuy and Amazon Prime members are getting $10 reward certificate for buying the game. There’s...

item.description:

Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled First came Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy, followed recently by the amazing Spyro Reignited Trilogy, and now we have yet another retro-inspired remake on our hands. Even though it feels like Activision is just mining our childhoods for gold at this point, I’m not complaining, because what we’re getting in return is just too damn good. Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled After much speculation and a strange furry delivery earlier this week, Activision has officially confirmed and announced a high definition reboot of Naughty Dog’s excellent PS1 go-karting romp. Dub...

item.title: Lower Pre-Owned Video Game Products Sales Will Likely Weigh On GameStop's Near Term Earnings - Forbes

Nintendo Co. Wii video games are displayed for sale inside a GameStop Corp. store in Louisville, Kentucky, on Thursday, March 15, 2018. G(Photographer: Luke Sharrett/Bloomberg) GameStop Inc (NYSE:GME) recently posted its Q3 FY 2018 results, which were below the street estimates. The company incurred a $587.5 million asset impairment charge primarily related to goodwill in Q3. It also lowered its fiscal 2018 guidance, which led to a sell off in the share price, following the earnings release. Looking forward, we forecast a mid-single digit decline in the company’s overall revenues for the f...

item.title: 'Super Smash Bros. Ultimate' Release Date And Special Edition Info: Which Version Should You Buy? - Forbes
item.description:
'Super Smash Bros. Ultimate' Release Date And Special Edition Info: Which Version Should You Buy?  Forbes

One of the most iconic Nintendo titles and most-anticipated games of the year on the Switch is almost here. Super Smash Bros. Ultimate is set to release on December 7. SSBU for Nintendo Switch It boasts a massive roster of characters–74 to be exact. I’ll break down the 10 things you need to know about the game later in the week, but for now, let’s look at the different versions available and find out which one is right for you. The Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Standard Edition is the most basic. It just includes the game and costs $59.99. Standard Edition On the pre-order side, My Best Buy an...

item.title: Technology: is it game over for consoles? - Financial Times
item.description:
Technology: is it game over for consoles?  Financial Times

Home entertainment has always been a ruthless business, but games consoles’ 50-year territorial war for the living room has been endlessly brutal. On screen, it is fought with chainsaws, battleaxes, plasma rifles or the Poltergust 3000 spectral vacuum cleaner. Behind the scenes, though, is an even bloodier conflict fought with long-term bets on technology, balance sheets, exclusivity agreements and games so intricate that they require 1,000-strong armies of staff to produce. The casualties are frequent. Who remembers the Casio PV-1000, the Timlex Mega Duck and the Bandai Playdia? Each may h...

item.title: Nintendo Switch Software Sales Will Likely See Strong Double-Digit Growth In The Near Term - Forbes
item.description:
Nintendo Switch Software Sales Will Likely See Strong Double-Digit Growth In The Near Term  Forbes

In this Nov. 15, 2018, photo, shoppers standing on an escalator passes by the logo of Nintendo at an electronics store in Tokyo.(AP Photo/Koji Sasahara) photocredit: ASSOCIATED PRESS Nintendo (OTCMKTS:NTDOY) has seen stellar growth since the launch of the Switch console, both in hardware and software sales. Since its launch the company has sold close to 23 million consoles and over 100 million software titles. The company expects to ship 20 million consoles and 100 million software titles in fiscal 2019. We have created an interactive dashboard ~ How Much Can Nintendo Switch Software Sales ...

item.title: The Game Awards 2018: What will we see at annual celebration turned game announcement hotbed? - The Telegraph
item.description:
The Game Awards 2018: What will we see at annual celebration turned game announcement hotbed?  The Telegraph

Despite its overly corporate sheen, the annual Game Awards show has slowly become one of the key dates on the gaming calendar. Taking over from Spike TV’s long-running Video Game Awards show in 2014, The Game Awards began life as a celebration of the year’s best games, but is now more anticipated as a glimpse into the next. With most of the year’s games on shelves by the time the December show rolls around, The Game Awards has become the venue of choice for publishers to announce new titles and shed more light on upcoming ones. Away from the throng and pressure of E3, The Game Awards has se...

item.title: Cyber Monday 2018: The Best Deals On Nintendo Switch - Forbes
item.description:
Cyber Monday 2018: The Best Deals On Nintendo Switch  Forbes

The Legend of Zelda: The Breath of the Wild. The Nintendo Switch is a hit, but Nintendo has set some high expectations for its new-ish hybrid console. The company wants to sell 20 million of the things this fiscal year, and that means its pushing hard into this current holiday season. Whether or not it will meet those goals remains a question, but for those looking to buy, rest assured that you have an enthusiastic manufacturer to contend with. That means that the Switch has some good deals here on Cyber Monday 2018, so you can still grab a discount if you missed it on Black Friday. Here’s ...

item.title: Best games of 2018 | Our guide to the top titles of the year so far - The Telegraph
item.description:
Best games of 2018 | Our guide to the top titles of the year so far  The Telegraph

As we reach the business end of 2018, we reflect on a year that has provided players with another formidable line-up of top games, packed with monster hunting hijinks, earnest indie love stories, god-thumping blockbusters and outlaws on the run. That is if you can tear yourself away from Fortnite, of course. We will be keeping an evolving list of the best games for Xbox One, PS4, Switch, PC and mobile across the year --with many of the best new and upcoming games sure to make the grade-- so check back regularly for updates and let us know in the comments if any of your favourites demand inc...

item.title: Here Are The Best Deals On Nintendo Switch For Black Friday 2018 - Forbes
item.description:
Here Are The Best Deals On Nintendo Switch For Black Friday 2018  Forbes

the Nintendo Switch If you’re looking to get a Nintendo Switch this Black Friday, be forewarned: you’ll likely end up spending a bunch of money on accessories on top of whatever deal price you’re actually paying. That doesn’t mean you shouldn’t get one, of course: Nintendo’s little hybrid console is a magical device, and it’s the only thing that will allow you to challenge strangers to Mario Kart on flights, which is how I passed my time on a recent trip to New Orleans. And Black Friday is a good time to pick one up, as a rule of thumb. Let’s take a look at the best deals on Nintendo Switc...

Amazon.com Inc. gift cards are displayed for sale inside a GameStop Corp. store in Louisville, Kentucky, on Thursday, March 15, 2018. (Photographer: Luke Sharrett/Bloomberg) GameStop Inc. (NYSE:GME) is scheduled to post its Q3 FY18 results on November 29. We expect the company to post a low single digit decline in the top line, as growth in New Video Game Software, and Digital, Technology Brands, Collectibles & Others will be more than offset by a decline in New Video Game Hardware, and Pre-Owned & Value Video Game Products, in our view. However, we forecast strong earnings growth in the n...

item.title: 'Pokémon: Let's Go' Has Topped The Japanese Charts And Boosted Switch Sales In The Process - Forbes
item.description:
'Pokémon: Let's Go' Has Topped The Japanese Charts And Boosted Switch Sales In The Process  Forbes

‘Pokémon: Let’s Go’ has done very well in Japan. The recently released and entirely excellent Pokémon: Let’s Go on the Switch has been received very well in Japan and helped to boost sales of its host console. In the first few days of the game’s release in Japan, it managed to sell 661,240 copies. However, the really remarkable news is how Switch sales have reacted to this game. Put simply, since the game was released last week the Switch has shifted 200,850 units. To put that figure into perspective, the PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 4 Pro only sold 8,922 and 8,867 units respectively. In a...

item.title: 'Zelda: Breath Of The Wild' May Not Be Part Of Any Timeline After All - Forbes
item.description:
'Zelda: Breath Of The Wild' May Not Be Part Of Any Timeline After All  Forbes

‘Breath of the Wild’ is now no longer part of the main timeline for the series. A few days ago, another book for Breath of the Wild was released. Entitled Creating a Champion, it features some comments by Eiji Aonuma where he changes his mind on previous comments about the game being at the end of The Legend of Zelda timeline. Before we get onto Aonuma’s original comments on Breath of the Wild’s timeline placement from August, it’s worth hearing what he now has to say. In books like the recently released The Legend of Zelda Encyclopedia, we revealed where each Zelda game fell on a timeline ...

item.title: Sorry, but the Nintendo 64 Classic isn’t happening anytime soon - Fast Company
item.description:
Sorry, but the Nintendo 64 Classic isn’t happening anytime soon  Fast Company

After Nintendo released the NES Classic Edition in 2016 and the Super NES Classic Edition last year, a Nintendo 64 Classic seemed like the next logical step. But speaking to Kotaku, Nintendo of America President Reggie Fils-Aime suggested that it’s not going to happen soon, if ever. “I would not ever rule something out,” he said, “but what I can tell you is certainly that’s not in our planning horizon.” Fils-Aime explained that Nintendo viewed the previous retro consoles as “limited time opportunities,” which gave the company some new hardware to sell as it wound down the Wii U and ramped u...

item.title: What's the best video games console for Christmas 2018? - The Guardian
item.description:
What's the best video games console for Christmas 2018?  The Guardian

A games console is the perfect Christmas present – it’s exciting, it’s cool and everyone can join in on the day (as long as you’ve had the foresight to sneak it out of its packaging on Christmas Eve to download the inevitable six hours of system updates). But selecting which machine to opt for is complicated and confusing, and if you get it wrong you may end up with yet another unloved gadget crammed in the cupboard where you keep the air fryer and mini candyfloss machine. Here are some tips for harassed parents or partners who have found the words “games console” on a loved one’s Christmas...

item.title: Here Are The Best Deals On Xbox One X For Black Friday 2018 - Forbes
item.description:
Here Are The Best Deals On Xbox One X For Black Friday 2018  Forbes

Xbox One X Console and Controller. Xbox One X is the console for the person that wants the best. Not necessarily in terms of exclusive software, mind you, where the PS4 still reigns supreme followed by the Nintendo Switch. But you can’t touch it when it comes to raw power, and that means that this is the machine you want if you’re looking to put that new 4K HDR TV through its paces. It’s the machine you want to get to see Red Dead Redemption 2 at its absolute best, which for some will be worth the price of admission alone. But the Xbox One X isn’t cheap, and so you might have been waiting u...

item.title: Google Express Has Some Of The Best Deals On PS4, Xbox One And Switch For Black Friday 2018 - Forbes
item.description:
Google Express Has Some Of The Best Deals On PS4, Xbox One And Switch For Black Friday 2018  Forbes

Xbox One X bundle Here’s an interesting, late-breaking retailer that’s throwing its hat firmly into the Black Friday ring for 2018: Google Express. It’s a Google partnership with Wal-Mart, Target, Costco and other retailers that is working as a sort of large-scale Amazon competitor. It’s not something I’ve used extensively or heard a huge amount about, but there’s no arguing with some of the prices it’s offering on video game consoles this Black Friday. I had thought that most of the deals had already solidified when I received this email last night, but there are several prices on here tha...

item.title: Best Black Friday Deals On Xbox One, PlayStation 4 & Nintendo Switch Consoles - Forbes
item.description:
Best Black Friday Deals On Xbox One, PlayStation 4 & Nintendo Switch Consoles  Forbes

Game consoles aren’t cheap. In addition to buying a console for hundreds of dollars, you often need to buy a second controller to play with friends. And if you want games, dropping $60 for the latest and greatest titles is nothing new. But every year, even as games remain expensive and consoles add more capabilities, Black Friday comes around. And every year, a variety of retailers offer outstanding deals on the Nintendo Switch, Sony PlayStation 4, and Microsoft Xbox One that take the sting out of buying a new game console. When you’re buying a new console on sale, there are often some othe...

item.title: Why The Wii U Beats Black Friday Nintendo Switch Bargains - Forbes
item.description:
Why The Wii U Beats Black Friday Nintendo Switch Bargains  Forbes

The Nintendo Switch is a great system for families, but my recommendation for a Nintendo Black Friday deal is the Wii U. Not only is it almost half the price to play many of the same (or very similar) games, but it offers multiplayer experiences like Nintendo Land that are still unmatched by the Switch. The Wii U underperformed by most measures, and is now perceived as something of a failed — or at least ill-timed — video game system. This reputation has a hidden benefit for families as the system’s games and hardware have a really low second hand price. Wii U Second Hand Price Tumbles Norm...

item.title: The 10 Best Video Gaming Deals For Black Friday 2018 - Forbes
item.description:
The 10 Best Video Gaming Deals For Black Friday 2018  Forbes

Black Friday is in full swing, though in most ways it’s already been in full swing for weeks. The video game world is not exactly shy about the crush of the holiday season, and retailers, console manufacturers, developers and online store owners have been pushing a wild morass of discounts basically since the beginning of the month, and they’ll keep doing so for some time. And yet there are still special deals to be had only on Black Friday, and there’s also a pleasant ritual about the biggest day of spending that American society has to offer, everyone soaked in stuffing and red wine and t...

item.title: Pokémon: Let’s Go Pikachu & Eevee! review – a children’s classic, refreshed - The Guardian
item.description:
Pokémon: Let’s Go Pikachu & Eevee! review – a children’s classic, refreshed  The Guardian

A beloved childhood film can easily be shared with the next generation, but the cherished video games of 1990s children can now look off-puttingly primitive, even if they’re as fun to play as ever. Super Mario and Sonic the Hedgehog’s early outings might have weathered the years well, but Pokémon: Red and Blue, a foundational text of the millennial generation, has not. The originals were, after all, played on a two-inch Game Boy screen. Pokémon: Let’s Go Eevee! and Let’s Go Pikachu! are transformational remakes of those 20-year-old games for the Nintendo Switch, with bright, beautiful carto...

item.title: The best Nintendo Switch games | Our essential guide to the best titles for at home or on the go - The Telegraph
item.description:
The best Nintendo Switch games | Our essential guide to the best titles for at home or on the go  The Telegraph

The first 18 months of the Nintendo Switch has produced a tremendous line-up of games. The idiosyncratic home-and-handheld hybrid console is host to a slew of inventive Nintendo treats and a range of independent gems. Even the big third-party publishers are getting involved. So out of that impressive nascent library, we pick our the 25 best Nintendo Switch games below. If there are any we have missed, then let us know your favourite Nintendo Switch games in the comments. And be sure to check out our list of the best PS4 games and best Xbox One games. Pokemon: Let’s Go The perfect stepping s...

credit: Getty Yesterday, we posted the big deals from GameStop’s Black Friday ad: the biggest retailer in gaming didn’t come up short, particularly when it comes to software, and it’s looking like it will be one of the better destinations on Black Friday whether you’ve already got a current generation system or not. This might not be immediately apparent by looking at the ad, however, because there’s a ton of information there and the eye is naturally drawn to price tags, for obvious reasons. But you shouldn’t miss this one little line that puts it up above some other retailers: “Free $50 g...

item.title: 'Pokémon: Let's Go' Review: It's Time To Go Back To A Rather Different Kanto - Forbes
item.description:
'Pokémon: Let's Go' Review: It's Time To Go Back To A Rather Different Kanto  Forbes

‘Pokémon: Let’s Go’ retains a lot from the classic mainline games in the series. Back when the Switch was launched last year, it was somewhat obvious that certain studios were taken aback by its massive popularity. So much so that developers like Game Freak realized they had to get in on the action and fast, and lo Pokémon: Let’s Go was born. For those that played Pokémon back during the Game Boy days, then the approach in Let’s Go will be very familiar. That’s because Pokémon: Let’s Go is based on Pokémon Yellow but by way of the newer mobile phenomenon Pokémon GO. This means we are back i...

item.title: Cyber Monday 2018 Ad Sales: Here Are Walmart's Best Deals - Forbes
item.description:
Cyber Monday 2018 Ad Sales: Here Are Walmart's Best Deals  Forbes

This post was created by the Contributor in partnership with BestBlackFriday.com, which specializes in holiday season sales. The deals highlighted within this post were independently selected. Only BestBlackFriday.com will receive compensation from them. Cyber Monday 2018 is running white hot with Amazon’s mega sales, Walmart’s updated deals, big Samsung discounts Best Buy and Target running site-wide extra savings, Thanks to store’s extensive Cyber Monday ad scan we know. And there are genuine Star Buys among them… My dedicated Cyber Monday 2018 store guides are now live for Amazon, for A...

item.title: 'Pokémon GO': It's Basically Impossible To Evolve Meltan Without 'Pokémon Let's Go' - Forbes
item.description:
'Pokémon GO': It's Basically Impossible To Evolve Meltan Without 'Pokémon Let's Go'  Forbes

Melmetal Pokémon GO introduces new creatures all the time, but these ones are different. Meltan and Melmetal, just introduced on Friday, are something different. They’re not just new Pokémon for Pokémon GO, they’re new Pokémon period: brand-new character designs meant as a cross-promotion for Pokemon Let’s Go Pikachu and Eevee, a set of new games just released for the Nintendo Switch. As far as cross-promotion goes, it’s a no-brainer: a unique Pokémon tied to a new Pokémon game just sort of makes sense. And yet the idea also raises the ever-present issue of “pay-to-win” for free-to-play gam...

item.title: A Warning To Anyone Looking For A Deal On PS4 Pro This Black Friday - Forbes
item.description:
A Warning To Anyone Looking For A Deal On PS4 Pro This Black Friday  Forbes

God of War. By and large, Black Friday is a good time to buy video game hardware. It’s not subject to some of the same bait and switch that you see in a lot of other industries, mostly because there isn’t a lot of room to do so with so few products and fairly well-known price points. If you see a good price you can buy it with some confidence: there’s a chance you might see someone match the price in the coming months, but it’s very unlikely that anyone is going to go lower. So go nuts when it comes to the Xbox One S, the Xbox One X, the PS4 or the Nintendo Switch. There’s one major console...

item.title: eBay Pre-Black Friday 2018: Best Deals On Gaming Consoles And Accessories - Forbes
item.description:
eBay Pre-Black Friday 2018: Best Deals On Gaming Consoles And Accessories  Forbes

If you’re ready to go shopping online and want to find some deals, eBay is an outstanding destination. Over the years, eBay has evolved into a desirable destination for online shoppers. The marketplace has a variety of products new and old, new and used, and offers some of the best prices on the market. Best of all, eBay has solidified itself as a place where you can find the products you desire at prices you’d be surprised to get. It’s against that backdrop that we recently evaluated eBay for deals on video game products. From the latest and greatest consoles to the best games, eBay has so...

item.title: Fallout 76 review: Can feel more like a task than a glorious adventure - The Independent
item.description:
Fallout 76 review: Can feel more like a task than a glorious adventure  The Independent

Fallout 76 is a lonely place. Emerging from your vault, two decades after nuclear war has devastated the Earth, your task to reclaim the ashes of what’s left is an inglorious one. There is no one to celebrate your toil, no one to commemorate you as a hero. Bethesda’s prequel to its Fallout series has taken the increasingly popular route of the online multiplayer – the irony is just how isolating an experience that can be. Each map hosts a maximum of 24 people, which means chance encounters with other settlers are a rarity. Even with several hours invested both into the game and its beta rel...

item.title: Best Buy 'Cyber Monday' 2018 Sales: What We Know So Far - Forbes
item.description:
Best Buy 'Cyber Monday' 2018 Sales: What We Know So Far  Forbes

This post was created by the Contributor in partnership with BestBlackFriday.com, which specializes in holiday season sales. The deals highlighted within this post were independently selected and do not contain affiliate links. As Black Friday 2018 approaches, doubts emerge: Will there be a better deal on Cyber Monday? Since this sales holiday is growing even faster than Black Friday, that’s a valid question. So do you wait? When it comes to Best Buy (52-page Black Friday ad scan), we have a very good idea… This is the second in my Cyber Monday 2018 preview series, following my Walmart Cybe...

item.title: Nasdaq contains losses as Nvidia woes hit chipmakers - Financial Times
item.description:
Nasdaq contains losses as Nvidia woes hit chipmakers  Financial Times

Another spate of gloomy outlook statements by computer chipmakers has cast renewed doubts on the strength of the electronics market, as shares in Nintendo and its Switch graphics unit supplier Nvidia both plunged. The technology-heavy Nasdaq Composite fell more than 1 per cent at the market’s open on Friday as unexpectedly weak sales guidance from Nvidia knocked the wider semiconductor sector and further fuelled concerns that chip demand could be set for a slowdown. By the end of the day the Nasdaq had recovered most of the losses but was 0.15 per cent lower at 7,247.87 points. Shares in Nv...

item.title: First Look At GameStop's 'Black Friday' 2018 Deals: Discounts On Xbox One X, PS4 And Games - Forbes
item.description:
First Look At GameStop's 'Black Friday' 2018 Deals: Discounts On Xbox One X, PS4 And Games  Forbes

It’s the big one, as far as gaming is concerned. Places like Best Buy, Target and Walmart have plenty to offer the video gaming public when it comes to deals for Balck Friday 2018, but GameStop is by far the largest gaming-focused retailer in the United States, and as such it’s a good place to go if you know what you want for Black Friday, and if that thing is games. We still don’t have the company’s full ad yet, but last night we got a look at a sneak peek teasing its biggest deals. So let’s look at some of the best GameStop deals for Balck Friday 2018 on things like Xbox One X, Nintendo S...

item.title: Best Buy's Black Friday 2018 Ad Has Nasty Surprises - Forbes
item.description:
Best Buy's Black Friday 2018 Ad Has Nasty Surprises  Forbes

This post was created by the Contributor in partnership with BestBlackFriday.com, which specializes in holiday season sales. The deals highlighted within this post were independently selected and do not contain affiliate links. Black Friday 2018 is counting down fast and some of the most impressive deals come from Best Buy’s 52-page Black Friday ad. On the surface, it has tempting savings on iPhones, Galaxy phones, the PS4, Xbox One, HDTVs and much more. But dig deeper and you will find not everything is as it seems. Just like Walmart’s problematic deals, Best Buy’s ad is hiding a number of...

item.title: Best Buy's Black Friday 2018 Gaming Deals: Big Discounts On Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PS4 - Forbes
item.description:
Best Buy's Black Friday 2018 Gaming Deals: Big Discounts On Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PS4  Forbes

Getty The big Black Friday ads are starting to come in. Yesterday we heard from Walmart, always one of the biggest centers of Black Friday madness whether we’re talking about tech or not, and today we’re hearing from Best Buy, the most recognizable physical electronics retailer in the country and always a major destination for consoles and games, not to mention HDTVs, sound systems and more or less everything else with a microchip in it. Today we’re focusing on all those gaming deals you can get, and it’s a good time to buy a Nintendo Switch, an Xbox One S or X, a PS4 or any games to go wit...

item.title: The 11 best Nintendo Switch games of all time - The Guardian
item.description:
The 11 best Nintendo Switch games of all time  The Guardian

Splatoon 2 A novel and lively take on the shooter genre that has you splattering urban arenas with bright ink, switching between human and squid forms to swim around in the resultant sea of colour. The funky 90s street-style aesthetic perfectly complements the fun, frenetic play, and it’s had so many updates since its release that you are constantly getting more for your money. • Read the review Super Mario Odyssey Mario sets off to run and jump around little planets again, each a self-contained ecosystem of puzzles, challenges and weird inhabitants that Mario can temporarily possess with h...

item.title: Black Friday 2018 Preview: GameStop Deals On Xbox One, Switch, PS4, And Games - Forbes
item.description:
Black Friday 2018 Preview: GameStop Deals On Xbox One, Switch, PS4, And Games  Forbes

Gamestop store facade. If you’re looking to load up on games and gaming hardware, there are few better times to do it than Black Friday. Sure, there are some times that are as good, but gaming is one of those places where we actually do see some of the best deals of the year on the day after Thanksgiving, and so you can safely make purchases without wondering too much about whether or not better deals will come along int he next few weeks–not necessarily true about the trickier worlds of TVs and such. GameStop is usually one of your best bets, too: as the only large-scale gaming-focused ret...

item.title: Kirby Is Getting A Giant Head Devouring Plush Next Summer - Forbes
item.description:
Kirby Is Getting A Giant Head Devouring Plush Next Summer  Forbes

The upcoming Kirby plush. Following the recent shocking trailer for Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, we now at least have a giant head devouring plush of Kirby on the way. If you missed the epic World of Light trailer (shown below) it results in Kirby surviving the annihilation of his Super Smash Bros. allies and forced to fix the world alone. Considering that the series started back with HAL Laboratory in 1999 for the N64 and that Masahiro Sakurai has helmed the games in the series since, the fact Kirby has been singled out like this should not be all that surprising. Anyway, everyone loves Kir...

item.title: Developers Discuss 'Diablo: Immortal' And How It Fits In Blizzard's Plans - Forbes
item.description:
Developers Discuss 'Diablo: Immortal' And How It Fits In Blizzard's Plans  Forbes

Diablo: Immortal Fans’ reaction to the announcement of the upcoming Blizzard Entertainment mobile title Diablo: Immortal at the BlizzCon convention last weekend was swift and vicious. We caught up with two leading developers at the show to discuss game’s design and that response. Team members were booed from the audience, fans posited during a Q&A hour that this was some kind of early April Fool’s Day joke, and the buzz overall was so negative that parent company Activision Blizzard’s stock dropped, apparently in reaction. Developers on stage were quick to reassure players that there were o...

item.title: What To Expect From Nintendo Switch Deals For Black Friday 2018 - Forbes
item.description:
What To Expect From Nintendo Switch Deals For Black Friday 2018  Forbes

Super Mario Odyssey. If you’re looking to buy a new console, you could do a whole lot worse than late November. In most cases, you could actually do a whole lot worse than early November or December, but Black Friday remains the best time to pick up the best deals. That means those magical hours when the Thanksgiving meal wears off and everyone storms into the world of retail to buy whatever it is they’ve been putting off buying. Historically speaking, that day has some of if not the best deals on most consoles for the year. So let’s say you’re looking to buy a Nintendo Switch this holiday ...

item.title: eBay's Early Black Friday 2018 Has Some Good Gaming Deals On Switch, Xbox One X, PS4, Red Dead - Forbes
item.description:
eBay's Early Black Friday 2018 Has Some Good Gaming Deals On Switch, Xbox One X, PS4, Red Dead  Forbes

Red Dead Redemption 2 Black Friday has had a way of expanding over the last few years. We remember that this is a retailer focused holiday more than a consumer-focused one: it’s the day when these retailers make it into the black for the season, selling as much merchandise as they possibly can to holiday shoppers. With that in mind, it’s not shocking that retailers are doing their best to start the party early and keep it going. eBay currently has some early Black Friday deals going up, and there are some excellent options for gamers out there. eBay isn’t always the first place you look fo...

item.title: Big Sale Has $60 Off Nintendo Switch, Savings On Xbox One X And 'Red Dead Redemption 2' - Forbes
item.description:
Big Sale Has $60 Off Nintendo Switch, Savings On Xbox One X And 'Red Dead Redemption 2'  Forbes

The Nintendo Switch. The Nintendo Switch is still a pretty new console, as far as these things go. It’s pretty hard to find anywhere below its MSRP of $299.99, and for a while, it was even hard to find at that price. We see bundles and other deals from time to time, but by and large you’re paying full price for this thing, at least now. Which makes today’s Google Express sale all the more remarkable: a wide-ranging code is giving 20% off a bunch of stuff, which means that you can take $60 off the price of a new Nintendo Switch. To get the discount, use promo code Wish20. With that extra mon...
